title: Migration patterns of 19th century, census records

content.prompt: A historian researching international migration patterns of the nineteenth century would find which of the following sources most useful?

choices.label: Census records from New York and Buenos Aires detailing the birthplaces of individuals
The diary of a German coal miner who emigrated to Canada
Letters from an East Asian migrant to the Caribbean to his family back home
A British factoryâ€™s invoices and its shipping and tax records

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
